mapper.sql: merID, merSubID, merTopID, merType, merName, merCumPresent, merDicPresent, merAppStat, merRecommend, isIndex, oweCredit
mapper.insert: insert into Merchant (merID, merSubID, merTopID, merType, merName, merCumPresent, merDicPresent, merAppStat, merRecommend, isIndex, oweCredit) values (#{merid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mersubid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mertopid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mercumpresent,jdbcType=REAL}, #{merdicpresent,jdbcType=REAL}, #{merappstat,jdbcType=BIT}, #{merrecommend,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isindex,jdbcType=BIT}, #{owecredit,jdbcType=REAL})

insert into Merchant
merID,
merSubID,
merTopID,
merType,
merName,
merCumPresent,
merDicPresent,
merAppStat,
merRecommend,
isIndex,
oweCredit,

mapper.update:
update Merchant
merSubID = #{mersubid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
merTopID = #{mertopid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
merType = #{mertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
merName = #{mername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
merCumPresent = #{mercumpresent,jdbcType=REAL},
merDicPresent = #{merdicpresent,jdbcType=REAL},
merAppStat = #{merappstat,jdbcType=BIT},
merRecommend = #{merrecommend,jdbcType=BIT},
isIndex = #{isindex,jdbcType=BIT},
oweCredit = #{owecredit,jdbcType=REAL},
where merID = #{merid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update Merchant set merSubID = #{mersubid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, merTopID = #{mertopid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, merType = #{mertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, merName = #{mername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, merCumPresent = #{mercumpresent,jdbcType=REAL}, merDicPresent = #{merdicpresent,jdbcType=REAL}, merAppStat = #{merappstat,jdbcType=BIT}, merRecommend = #{merrecommend,jdbcType=BIT}, isIndex = #{isindex,jdbcType=BIT}, oweCredit = #{owecredit,jdbcType=REAL} where merID = #{merid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select max(merID)+1 as mmerID from Merchant

select c.memID,c.memPhone,c.memName from Merchant a left join MemberCard b on a.merID=b.merID left join Member c on b.memID=c.memID left join MemberManager d on d.memID=c.memID where a.merID=#{merID} and d.mmanagerID is null
